author: Lukas Reiter
script:
"""
This script performs on-the-fly modifications on outgoing in-scope HTTP requests.
Use this template script to perform modifications on HTTP request bodies or headers
by modifying the content of variables headers or body_content.
"""
if in_scope:
	request = message_info.getRequest()
	request_info = helpers.analyzeRequest(request)
	headers = request_info.getHeaders()
	body_offset = request_info.getBodyOffset()
	body_bytes = request[body_offset:]
	body_content = helpers.bytesToString(body_bytes)
	
	# insert code here
	
	request = helpers.buildHttpMessage(headers, body_content)
	message_info.setRequest(request)
name: Template to Perform On-The-Fly Modifications On In-Scope Request Bodies/Headers
